imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Full-color round emblem logo with transparent background; futuristic green/blue energy orb with a circuit ring and curved “EcoPowerHub AI” text along the bottom arc; sharp high-tech edges (ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png, 1024x1024)

existing_features.title: Generate (or retrieve) the PNG asset `ecopowerhub-logo-full-color.1024x1024.png` (1024×1024, transparent background) matching the EcoPowerHub AI futuristic blue/green energy-orb emblem style, and deliver **Base64 Slice 1** of the PNG payload as plain text suitable for concatenation with slices 2–4 and a single decode pass.

projectName: Deliver Base64 Slice 1 for EcoPowerHub AI full-color emblem logo
